name: UpdateCommitComment
description:
Update a comment on a GitHub commit.

Use this tool to modify the text of an existing comment on a commit in a GitHub repository. Ideal for refining or correcting comments after they have been posted.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The GitHub account owner of the repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. This is not case sensitive. Provide the repository's exact name as it appears on GitHub.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: comment_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the commit comment being updated. It is an integer value that specifies the comment to be edited within the repository.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

parameters.name: comment_contents
parameters.description: The updated text of the commit comment. Enter the new content you wish to save.
